actor_awards.notes: Renowned for his performances in 'The Asphalt Jungle' and 'Dr. Strangelove'.

filmography.title: Virginia
filmography.role_description: A wealthy northerner who becomes involved in a romantic rivalry in the South; Hayden's film debut.
filmography.plot: A woman returns to her family estate in Virginia to sell it but finds herself torn between her heritage and a new romance.

filmography.title: Bahama Passage
filmography.role_description: The son of a salt mine owner in the Bahamas who falls for a woman brought to the island.
filmography.plot: A young man managing a salt mine on a remote island faces family tension and romance.

filmography.title: The Asphalt Jungle
filmography.role_description: A rugged, small-time hooligan and 'hooligan' recruited for a jewel heist who dreams of buying back his family's horse farm.
filmography.plot: A major heist goes off as planned, until bad luck and double crosses cause everything to unravel.

filmography.title: The Star
filmography.role_description: A former actor turned boat mechanic who tries to help a faded movie star (Bette Davis) find happiness outside of Hollywood.
filmography.plot: A fading movie queen, broke and unable to face reality, tries to restart her career while a former actor tries to save her from herself.

filmography.title: So Big
filmography.role_description: A Dutch truck farmer who marries a schoolteacher, leaving her a widow to raise their son alone.
filmography.plot: A woman raises her son alone on a truck farm outside Chicago, hoping he will become an architect.

filmography.title: Crime Wave
filmography.role_description: A hard-bitten, toothpick-chewing police detective who ruthlessly pressures an ex-con to help him catch a gang.
filmography.plot: A parolee tries to go straight but gets pulled back into a bank robbery scheme by his old cellmates and a relentless cop.

filmography.title: Prince Valiant
filmography.role_description: A noble knight of the Round Table who mentors the young Prince Valiant.
filmography.plot: A young Viking prince strives to become a knight in King Arthur's court and restore his exiled father to his throne.

filmography.title: Johnny Guitar
filmography.role_description: A former gunslinger who carries a guitar instead of a weapon, caught in a feud between two strong-willed women.
filmography.plot: A strong-willed saloon owner battles the local townspeople and a rival rancher who want to force her out.

filmography.title: Suddenly
filmography.role_description: A small-town sheriff held hostage by assassins planning to kill the President of the United States.
filmography.plot: A group of assassins take over a house in a small town where the President is scheduled to pass by on a train.

filmography.title: Naked Alibi
filmography.role_description: A police chief who is dismissed for police brutality and obsessively tracks a cop-killer to Mexico.
filmography.plot: A police chief pursues a suspect he believes is a cop killer into Mexico, despite being fired from the force.

filmography.title: The Last Command
filmography.role_description: The legendary knife-fighter who defies orders to return to the Alamo to fight for Texas independence.
filmography.plot: Jim Bowie returns to Texas and joins the defenders of the Alamo against the Mexican army.

filmography.title: The Eternal Sea
filmography.role_description: A real-life naval officer who fights to remain in command of an aircraft carrier after losing his leg in WWII.
filmography.plot: An American admiral fights to continue his career and command a carrier after losing a leg in battle.

filmography.title: The Killing
filmography.role_description: A career criminal who meticulously plans a racetrack heist, only to see it unravel due to human error.
filmography.plot: A career criminal assembles a team for a racetrack heist, but the plan is compromised by one member's wife.

filmography.title: Crime of Passion
filmography.role_description: A police lieutenant whose ambitious wife commits murder to help advance his career.
filmography.plot: An advice columnist gives up her career to marry a cop, then drives him to success through deadly means.

filmography.title: Zero Hour!
filmography.role_description: The pilot who must talk a traumatized veteran down to land a plane; the direct inspiration for 'Airplane!'.
filmography.plot: A pilot with a fear of flying must land an airliner after the crew becomes incapacitated by food poisoning.

filmography.title: Terror in a Texas Town
filmography.role_description: A Swedish whaler who arrives in a western town to claim his father's farm and fights land grabbers with a harpoon.
filmography.plot: A Swedish whaler comes to Texas to help his father, only to find him murdered and his land seized.

filmography.title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
filmography.role_description: A paranoid, cigar-chomping Air Force general who launches a nuclear attack to protect his 'precious bodily fluids'.
filmography.plot: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

filmography.title: Hard Contract
filmography.role_description: A hitman hired to kill three people in Europe who begins to question his profession.
filmography.plot: A professional killer hired to eliminate three targets in Europe finds his conscience awakening.

filmography.title: The Godfather
filmography.role_description: A corrupt police captain on the payroll of a drug kingpin who punches Michael Corleone and meets a violent end.
filmography.plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

filmography.title: The Long Goodbye
filmography.role_description: An alcoholic, Hemingway-esque writer with a troubled marriage who becomes a suspect in a murder case.
filmography.plot: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend accused of murdering his wife, uncovering a complex web of deceit.
filmography.awards: National Society of Film Critics: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.role_description: A peasant patriarch in Italy, representing the working class in this sweeping historical epic.
filmography.plot: The epic tale of two friends born on the same day in Italy—one a peasant, the other a landowner—spanning the first half of the 20th century.

filmography.title: King of the Gypsies
filmography.role_description: The dying patriarch of a gypsy tribe who passes his leadership to his reluctant grandson.
filmography.plot: A young man is torn between his modern life and his heritage when his grandfather names him the new King of the Gypsies.

filmography.title: Winter Kills
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, eccentric tank-driving patriarch involved in a conspiracy reminiscent of the Kennedy assassination.
filmography.plot: The brother of an assassinated US President discovers a new lead suggesting a complex conspiracy behind the murder.

filmography.title: 9 to 5
filmography.role_description: The chairman of the board who unexpectedly praises the changes made by three women who kidnapped their boss.
filmography.plot: Three female employees of a sexist, egotistical, lying, hypocritical bigot find a way to turn the tables on him.

filmography.title: Venom
filmography.role_description: A grandfather held hostage by terrorists and a deadly black mamba snake; Hayden's final feature film role.
filmography.plot: Terrorists attempt to kidnap a boy but get trapped in his house with a deadly black mamba snake.
